com.logitopia.jmortar.core.test

Class AbstractUnitTest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.test.AbstractUnitTest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The subject type.

    public abstract class AbstractUnitTest<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The AbstractUniTest is a unit test that provides access to the subject and private subject resources.

      • executePrivateMethod

        public java.lang.Object executePrivateMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                                             java.lang.Class[] parameterTypes,
                                             java.lang.Object[] parameters)
                                      throws PrivateTestMethodException
        Execute a private method on the given subject.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the method on the subject to execute.
        parameterTypes - The types of the parameters that the method uses.
        parameters - The parameters to be passed to the method.
        Returns:
        The response from the private method.
        Throws:
        PrivateTestMethodException - An exception occurs when we can't reflectively access the private method.
